name: Frans Ottink
biography:
Dutch ceramicist Frans Ottink (born 1961) has been designing porcelain tablewares both artistically and for corporate and individual commissions since 1989. Ottink’s style is characterized by a dedication to simple quality and clean forms. He studied at the Academy for Visual Education in Amersfoort and the Art EZ Institute of the Arts in Arnhem. Ottink has gone on to teach ceramics and design at the Design Academy in Eindoven, Netherlands and the HKU School of the Arts in Utrecht.
